TopicTitle: Newbie here! How can I can transfer my samples in 0.22?

Articles.Content: I am planning a mission to the mun, based on the Apolo 11 mission. So I was wondering, is that a way to transfer samples and reports stored in one pod to another, while they are docked, or maybe transfer the samples back to the Kerbal while it's on EVA and than to the other pod?

This has been asked and answered and was still even on the first page of Gameplay Questions; http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/54095-Anyway-to-transfer-samples-and-reports-between-command-pods

In short, no.
